long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Firefox cannot use Java plugin (used to work in F23)
Version-Release: firefox-45.0.1-2.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open Firefox (after ensuring Java plugin is installed) 2. Go to https://www.java.com/en/download/installed.jsp 3. Click on "Verify Java version" button
Actual results:
Firefox throws the following errors:
/usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459 /usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459 /usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459 /usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459 /usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459 /usr/lib64/firefox/plugin-container: symbol lookup error: /usr/lib64/firefox/libxul.so: undefined symbol: gtk_widget_path_iter_get_state [9212] WARNING: pipe error (60): Connection reset by peer: file /builddir/build/BUILD/firefox-45.0.1/firefox-45.0.1/ipc/chromium/src/chrome/common/ipc_channel_posix.cc, line 459
Expected results: Java applet works
Additional Information:
Build identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Fedora; Linux x86_64; rv:45.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/45.0
Java(TM) Plug-in 11.77.2
File: libnpjp2.so Path: /usr/java/jdk1.8.0_77/jre/lib/amd64/libnpjp2.so Version: 11.77.2 State: Enabled Next Generation Java Plug-in 11.77.2 for Mozilla browsers
firefox-45.0.1-4.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-eae761f28d
Confirmed firefox-45.0.1-4.fc24.x86_64 package fixes issue. Thank you.

firefox-45.0.1-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-eae761f28d
firefox-45.0.1-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
